channel.title: Dinosaur Diamond Byway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Dinosaur Diamond Byway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-191 North at US-40
item.description: US-191 North at US-40 in Duchesne. Turn left for US-40 west to Heber City; turn right for US-40 East/US-191 North to Roosevelt. US-191 North joins US-40 eastbound to Vernal. Turn right to continue on the Dinosaur Diamond Byway.

item.title: US-191 North - Dinosaur Diamond Scenic Byway
item.description: US-191 North - Dinosaur Diamond Scenic Byway in Carbon County.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South near Helper
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South near Helper. The sign beneath the shield designates this stretch of highway as a segment of Dinosaur Diamond Byway - part of America’s Byway System.
